item.title: Data Pipeline Design Framework
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Motivation of Designing Data Pipeline Framework To improve and strongly go-live the data pipeline, besides apply best practices and pillar for Data Pipeline Native Solution, a design framework and pattern are robustly help us in:
